title: Giro d’Italia Presentation Delayed, Vuelta a España Details Next Month: Here’s What We Know About the ‘Other’ Grand Tours
content:
Routes and profiles about next year's Giro and Vuelta are still under wraps, with the Italian grand tour's big reveal postponed until January. Where will the 'Big 4' face off?

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Presentation Delayed, Vuelta a España Details Next Month: Here’s What We Know About the ‘Other’ Grand Tours on Velo.
author: ahood
